mapper.insert: insert into qna_board(title, content, userName) values(#{title}, #{content}, #{userName})
mapper.select: select bno, title, content, userName, regDate, viewCnt from qna_board where bno = #{bno}

select bno, title, userName, regDate, viewCnt from qna_board
where title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE userName LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
